serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/serialNumber' Serial number of the container.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refStreetlightGroup.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

brandName.description: Property. Name of the cabinet's brand.

modelName.description: Property. Name of the cabinet's model.

manufacturerName.description: Property. Name of the cabinet's manufacturer.

cupboardMadeOf.description: Property. Material the cabinet's cupboard is made of.

features.description: Property. A list of cabinet controller features.

compliantWith.description: Property. A list of standards to which the cabinet controller is compliant with (ex. IP54)

annotations.description: Property. A field reserved for annotations (incidences, remarks, etc.)

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Relationship. A reference to a point of interest associated to this observation.

dateServiceStarted.description: Property. Date at which the cabinet controller started giving service.

dateLastProgramming.description: Property. Date at which there was a programming operation over the cabinet.

nextActuationDeadline.description: Property. Deadline for next actuation to be performed (programming, testing, etc.).

responsible.description: Property. Responsible for the cabinet controller, i.e. entity in charge of actuating (programming, etc.).

workingMode.description: Property. Working mode for this cabinet controller.

description.description: Property. Timestamp of the last change of lamp made

maximumPowerAvailable.description: Property. The maximum power available (by contract) for the circuits controlled by this cabinet.

energyConsumed.description: Property. Energy consumed by the circuits controlled since metering started (since dateMeteringStarted).

energyCost.description: Property. Cost of the energy consumed by the circuits controlled since the metering start date.

reactiveEnergyConsumed.description: Property. Energy consumed (with regards to reactive power) by circuits since the metering start date

dateMeteringStarted.description: Property. The starting date for metering energy consumed.

lastMeterReading.description: Property. Value of the last reading obtained from the energy consumed metering system.

meterReadingPeriod.description: Property. The periodicity of energy consumed meter readings in days.

frequency.description: Property. The working frequency of the circuit.

totalActivePower.description: Property. Active power currently consumed (counting all phases).

totalReactivePower.description: Property. Reactive power currently consumed (counting all phases).

activePowerR.description: Property. Active power consumed in R phase.

activePowerS.description: Property. Active power consumed in S phase.

activePowerT.description: Property. Active power consumed in T phase.

reactivePowerR.description: Property. Reactive power in R phase.

reactivePowerS.description: Property. Reactive power in S phase.

reactivePowerT.description: Property. Reactive power in T phase.

powerFactorR.description: Property. Power factor for phase R.

powerFactorS.description: Property. Power factor for phase S.

powerFactorT.description: Property. Power factor for phase T.

intensityR.description: Property. Electric intensity in R phase.

intensityS.description: Property. Electric intensity in S phase.

intensityT.description: Property.  Electric intensity in T phase.

voltageR.description: Property. Electric tension in phase R.

voltageS.description: Property. Electric tension in phase S.

voltageT.description: Property. Electric tension in phase T.

thdrVoltageR.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (R) of voltage in phase R.

thdrVoltageS.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (S) of voltage in phase S.

thdrVoltageT.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (T) of voltage in phase T.

thdrIntensityR.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (R) of intensity in phase R.

thdrIntensityS.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (S) of intensity in phase S.

thdrIntensityT.description: Property. Total harmonic distortion (T) of intensity in phase T.
